nodes.documentation:
@dev Retrieves currently used block reward contract
@return configured block reward contract address
nodes.name: blockRewardContract

nodes.documentation:
@dev Updates address of currently used block reward contract
@param _blockReward address of a new contract
nodes.name: setBlockRewardContract

nodes.documentation:
@dev Retrieves current fee value
@return current value of fee, 1e18 is 100%
nodes.name: getFee

nodes.documentation:
@dev Calculates the fee amount to be subtracted from the value.
@param _value the base value from which fees are calculated
nodes.name: calculateFee
setFee

nodes.documentation:
@dev Internal setter for fee
@param _fee the fee percentage
nodes.name: _setFee

nodes.documentation:
@dev Returns the state of the fee manager configuration: whether
it is ready to collect and distribute fee or not.
nodes.name: isFeeCollectingActivated

nodes.documentation:
@dev Distributes fee as per the logic of the fee manager.
In this particular case, the amount of fee is passed the block 
reward contract which will mint new tokens and distribute them
among the stakers.
IMPORTANT: make sure that the code checks that the block reward
contract is initialized before calling this method.
@param _fee amount of tokens to be distributed
nodes.name: _distributeFee

attributes.documentation:
@dev Distributes fee as per the logic of the fee manager.
In this particular case, the amount of fee is passed the block 
reward contract which will mint new tokens and distribute them
among the stakers.

attributes.name: _distributeFee

blockRewardContract().details: Retrieves currently used block reward contract

calculateFee(uint256).details: Calculates the fee amount to be subtracted from the value.

params._value: the base value from which fees are calculated

isFeeCollectingActivated().details: Returns the state of the fee manager configuration: whether it is ready to collect and distribute fee or not.

owner().details: Tells the address of the owner

setBlockRewardContract(address).details: Updates address of currently used block reward contract

setFee(uint256).details: Sets the fee percentage amount for the mediator operations. Only the owner can call this method.

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params.newOwner: the address to transfer ownership to.
